Thank you Riot for this awesome event! C'mon guys lets smash the community wall and be proud and courage's for OCE. Completes mural wall finds {{champion:104}}   cigar, we shall protect the cities from Nautilus? by playing league.

Will the mystery skin that you get instead of the mystery champion if you own them all have double the legendary chance? :^)

{{summoner:11}}

I'll explain it all for everyone's reference:
If the community unlocks the 5th prize (free mystery champ) and you've already got all the champs, you'll receive a mystery skin instead but it **will not** be double legendary chance.

_Editing in my other response:_ We've had to change it to the standard gifting rule as it wasn't possible to customize the mystery champion rules for what could be such a large prize out.
So if you have less than 10 unowned champions you'll get a mystery skin instead.
I know it's almost impossible, but what if you have all the skins too?
Then Riot thanks you for funding their retirement.
Last year it was if you have less than 10 unowned champions you gain a mystery skin. Just double checking is this year ALL and not less than 10 champions?

Hi Krawia, We've had to change it to the same standard you mention above as it wasn't possible to customize the mystery champion rules for what could be such a large prize out.
So if you have less than 10 unowned champions you'll get a mystery skin instead.
What if you have exactly 10 unowned champions, will you still get a champion or a skin?
Then you will get a mystery champion.

You'll have to wait and see what the threat is :) On the timing - Ocean Week actually kicks off on the weekend before Australia Day similar to last year. It's a 9 day long event with two weekends as part of it, so there should be plenty of time to get some games in.

It's kicking off the weekend before Australia Day similar to last year. The origin of Ocean Week is to celebrate Australia Day and Waitangi Day with an event. It's a 9-Day long event this year, which includes two weekends, so there should be time to get some games in.
